title: Computing Pedagogy Design Utilizing Structural Equation Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computing concepts and educational experience
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen K-12 computing education design competencies for pre-service teachers, providing learning experiences simulating real classrooms through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of self-efficacy, interest, and prior experience in computing education using structural equation modeling
Learners can develop instructional strategies reflecting learner characteristics (self-efficacy, interest, prior experience) in computing education design
Learners can design computing education activities in VR-based simulations and conduct formative assessments based on learner responses

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
